original: phyi nas 'don byed pa'i/_/de dag 'dul ba'i ded dpon des byed shog_/üîΩrnam par bshad pa 'di las gzhan pa'i bshad pa de kho na ma mthong ba'i skye bo
analyzed: phyi nas 'don byed pa'i/_/de dag 'dul ba'i ded dpon des byed shog_/ rnam par bshad pa 'di las gzhan pa'i bshad pa de kho na ma mthong ba'i skye bo
translated: May that captain of the ship of discipline save them.

original: 'dod rgyal rnams kyis byas pa la yid brtan par mi bya'i 'di dang 'di lta bu'iüîΩ'grel pa rtsha ba'i rgyud mtha' dag gi nges pa dang /_drang ba legs par gtan la
analyzed: 'dod rgyal rnams kyis byas pa la yid brtan par mi bya'i 'di dang 'di lta bu'i 'grel pa rtsha ba'i rgyud mtha' dag gi nges pa dang /_drang ba legs par gtan la
translated: Those who have not seen the truth should not rely on the explanations of those who have composed commentaries on this tantra out of mere speculation.

original: 'bebs pa la yid brtan te gnas par bya'o/_/kye'i rdo rje'i nges pa'i don gyi rgya
analyzed: 'bebs pa la yid brtan te gnas par bya'o/_/kye'i rdo rje'i nges pa'i don gyi rgya
translated: They should rely on and abide by the explanations of those who have seen the truth, who have ascertained the meaning of all the tantras and who have properly established the definitive and provisional meaning of the tantras.

original: cher bshad pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug chen po byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos
analyzed: cher bshad pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug chen po byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos
translated: This commentary on the definitive meaning of the Hevajra Tantra was composed by the great lord of the tenth stage, the bodhisattva Vajragarbha.

original: mdzad pa rdzogs so//üîΩrgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma chen po mi tri zhabs la/_bod kyi lo tsha ba 'bro
analyzed: mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma chen po mi tri zhabs la/_bod kyi lo tsha ba 'bro
translated: It is complete.üîΩThe Tibetan translator, the monk Sherab Drakpa, made many requests to the great Indian master and guru, the venerable Maitripa,

analyzed: dge slong shes rab grags pas mang du gsol ba btab nas/_legs par mnyan
